title: VTS Kit Angular Schematic
description: Creates a new, generic pipe definition in the given or default project.

path.description: The path at which to create the pipe file, relative to 'shared' or 'libs' folder. Default mode is set to `libs`
path.x-prompt: Where to create new pipe, relative to 'shared' or 'libs' folder (default set to create 'libs' pipe, use option --shared to create shared pipe)?

name.description: The name of the new pipe.
name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the pipe?

shared.description: Specifies whether to create shared component.

flat.description: When true (the default) creates files at the top level of the project.

skipTests.description: Do not create "spec.ts" test files for the new pipe.

skipImport.description: Do not import this pipe into the owning NgModule.
